text: They were fighting among themselves about the fir and the thorn. And he boasted of the fir, and said, I am a fine man, and a slender man, and a tall man, and I am for building vessels and roofs of temples. How dare you compare yourself to me? "If you remember", replied the spider, "the axes and the saws that cut you, you would prefer the luck of the spider! Sometimes fame is not appropriate.
title: El abeto y el espino
author: nan Esopo
